name: 龍仁光
objective: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID 控制器之設計，Lead-Lag 補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
schedule:
1: Introduction
2: Matlab Tutorial
3: Simulink: Quick Start
4: Simulink: Modeling
5: Simulink: Simulation & Analysis
6: Dynamic Systems Modeling
7: Time-Domain Analysis
8: Root Locus Analysis
9: Midterm Exam
10: Frequency-Domain Analysis
11: PID Controller Design
12: Lag-Lead Compensator Design
13: Case Studies (1/3)
14: Case Studies (2/3)
15: Case Studies (3/3)
16: Special Topics (1/2)
17: Special Topics (2/2)
18: Final Exam
scorePolicy: 實習操作與報告：60%、考試：20%、出席：20%
materials: 李宜達編著，控制系統設計與模擬：使用 MATLAB/SIMULINK ，全華圖書、2009。
